Arrange for diagnostic x-rays to be taken.

The right adjustment is all it takes.
Here at The Joint Chiropractic, we’ve got your back. Every service we provide comes with personalized, compassionate care that's designed with you and your needs in mind. Whether you're seeking help with chronic pain from a personal injury accident, work incident, general bodily injury, in search of new supplements to enhance your diet, or want to be set on the path to healthy weight loss, we'd love to be the team to help you get there!
We are seeking a Part-Time Chiropractor, for a personal injury-based practice located in our Mattapan MA office! Our Chiropractors provide safe noninvasive and effective treatment that generally serves personal injury accidents, workers comp injuries and wellness rehabilitation therapy. Our Chiropractic ensures service is provided by skilled professionals, who commit to improving the health and wellness of individuals. Our main goal is to provide excellent service by forms of various techniques, which include manual therapy, manipulative therapy, physical exercises, kinesio taping and more. Furthermore, we find passion by educating our clientele on the importance of optimal health and personal care. We are looking for a positive individual with excellent communication skills, and a passion for helping others through Chiropractic Care. We are an excellent team of working individuals, who provide nothing but the best service to our clientele. We offer a great salary, one that is up for negotiation depending on experience. Whilst providing performance incentives, we offer paid time off and holiday pay. If full-time, our office hours are Monday through Friday from 9 AM - 6 PM. If part-time, our office hours are Monday, Wednesday and Friday from 9 AM - 6 PM. Please be advised that our office hours may vary for a full-time candidate. We are looking for a Doctor of Chiropractic, with a Massachusetts State License in good standing, who can start immediately! Please email your resume and cover letter.

Job Title: Chiropractor Wanted - $148k - Step Into an Existing, Successful Practice
Job Description:
We have an immediate position open for a Senior Doctor in our clinic.
*
This is not a “build it from the ground up” position. This is an existing high six-low seven figure practice. The current doctor is able to achieve this success working just 4 days a week, and is looking to transition into retirement. This is not a “practice sale;” it is to work in a W2 capacity as a case manager and lead doctor of Chiropractic, overseeing 1 associate.
*
*
This position requires a high level of leadership, vision of care, and communication.
*
*
Highlights:

Voted best chiropractic office in Austin this past year! Lifespring Chiropractic just turned 4 years old. We are growing and are looking for the right fit to add to the team. Come join a thriving practice in one of the fasted growing cities in the country! We are a young, fun, modern chiropractic office seeking a motivated, coachable chiropractor with great communication skills.
We may not be for everyone, but we know what we want! We want a chiropractor to join us who shares our same mission and values! Someone who wants to change the health landscape of the Austin community and beyond! Not just a job to clock in from 9 to 5. We want to change the world for the better! We believe in a healthy company culture that embodies health, work life balance, and clear communication skills.
We are looking for somebody who is passionate about CHIROPRACTIC! We are a full spine office blending a variety of techniques such as Diversified, Gonstead, Drop Table, Toggle, Activator, TRT, TIC, and extremity adjusting. We specialize in extremities and upper cervical (TIC) and see a lot of people who come in due to an extremity concern alone. Willingness to learn extremity adjusting and TIC is a to work in this office. We can teach you if you do not have any previous experience.

Maryland Spine Rehab, a new and fast growing, Chiropractic group is currently looking for a Doctor of Chiropractic to manage and grow a practice and get rewarded for it. Our clinics provide a comfortable and independent work environment. We provide the highest quality patient care and have an emphasis on soft tissue injuries of the spine and extremities. This position is available at our upcoming, new location in* Baltimore, MD.*
We are looking for a Doctor of Chiropractic that has excellent communication skills and has an innate interest in people, to join our team of highly skilled and patient oriented Clinicians. If you are a Chiropractor who is interested in stepping into a growing practice, in a leading role, can maintain the current patient base, while continuing to help build the practice that you envision, we are interested in talking to you.
The Doctor of Chiropractic takes comprehensive health histories, provides a diagnosis, comments on their patients physical condition and lifestyle, orders tests as indicated, administers treatment as appropriate, and provides lifestyle advice about home care and pain management.

Who we are looking for:
A subluxation-based practitioner comfortable with utilizing x-rays to substantiate care.
A faced-paced provider that can see 125+ patient visits in a week.
A motivated individual. Pay is a base salary plus a competitive commission. We want a provider that is looking to earn over $100,000 a year in income.
An accountable team player. The contract term starts at 2.5 years; the provider must commit enough time to care for their patient base.

Well Set is a sports, pediatric, and prenatal certified practice located in the popular Highlands neighborhood in Denver, CO. We provide movement focused treatments for active families. Our providers include chiropractors, physical therapists, massage therapists, and acupuncturists. We are committed to providing the most high-quality experiences for our patients and community members by continuously striving to advance our techniques and to expand our service options for our patients. Our main goals are to: get patients out of pain as soon as possible; use the fewest number of treatments; and help our community in a fun and positive environment. We are a cash practice that lives by a “few and through” rule. If we don’t have our patients on the right track within a few visits, we get them to the right provider whether that means getting care in or out of our office. Chiropractors have a flexible schedule and autonomy to work within their expertise while also receiving support to continue to grow and gain skills through collaboration with other team members.

Well Set is a sports, pediatric, and prenatal certified practice located in the popular Highlands neighborhood in Denver, CO. We provide movement focused treatments for active families. Our providers include chiropractors, physical therapists, massage therapists, and acupuncturists. We are committed to providing the most high-quality experiences for our patients and community members by continuously striving to advance our techniques and to expand our service options for our patients. Our main goals are to: get patients out of pain as soon as possible; use the fewest number of treatments; and help our community in a fun and positive environment. We are a cash practice that lives by a “few and through” rule. If we don’t have our patients on the right track within a few visits, we get them to the right provider whether that means getting care in or out of our office. Chiropractors have a flexible schedule and autonomy to work within their expertise while also receiving support to continue to grow and gain skills through collaboration with other team members.

About us
People's Best Care Chiropractic
Since we opened our doors in 2006, we've been building our reputation as the place to go for all things health and wellness in Brockton & Mattapan in Massachusetts. We offer a variety of services ranging from Chiropractic Care and Rehabilitation Services to Health Food Products and Weight Loss Advice. Every service we provide comes with personalized, compassionate care that's designed with you and your needs in mind. Whether you're seeking help with chronic pain from a personal injury accident, work incident, general bodily injury, in search of new supplements to enhance your diet, or want to be set on the path to healthy weight loss, we'd love to be the team to help you get there!
We are seeking a Part-Time Chiropractor, for a personal injury-based practice located in our Mattapan MA office! Our Chiropractors provide safe noninvasive and effective treatment that generally serves personal injury accidents, workers comp injuries and wellness rehabilitation therapy. Our Chiropractic ensures service is provided by skilled professionals, who commit to improving the health and wellness of individuals. Our main goal is to provide excellent service by forms of various techniques, which include manual therapy, manipulative therapy, physical exercises, kinesio taping and more. Furthermore, we find passion by educating our clientele on the importance of optimal health and personal care. We are looking for a positive individual with excellent communication skills, and a passion for helping others through Chiropractic Care. We are an excellent team of working individuals, who provide nothing but the best service to our clientele. We offer a great salary, one that is up for negotiation depending on experience. Whilst providing performance incentives, we offer paid time off and holiday pay. If full-time, our office hours are Monday through Friday from 9 AM - 6 PM. If part-time, our office hours are Monday, Wednesday and Friday from 9 AM - 6 PM. Please be advised that our office hours may vary for a full-time candidate. We are looking for a Doctor of Chiropractic, with a Massachusetts State License in good standing, who can start immediately! Please email your resume and cover letter.

Well Set is a sports, pediatric, and prenatal certified practice located in the popular Highlands neighborhood in Denver, CO. We provide movement focused treatments for active families. Our main goals are to: get patients out of pain as soon as possible; use the fewest number of treatments; and help our community in a fun and positive environment. We are a cash practice that lives by a “few and through” rule. Arrange for diagnostic x-rays to be taken.

Well Set is a sports, pediatric, and prenatal certified practice located in the popular Highlands neighborhood in Denver, CO. We provide movement focused treatments for active families. 100% Chiropractic is a family of like-minded Doctors, Chiropractic Assistants, and Massage Therapists who are on a mission to help people see health differently. Patients enjoy the energetic, friendly, and warm environment that our beautiful, modern offices offer for their chiropractic wellness care.
We are looking for a dynamic candidate to be the lead doctor in the new Westminster, CO office, with the opportunity to open your own 100% Chiropractic office after you master how to become a successful business owner and doctor with this position if you wish. The position will have a base salary plus bonuses based on performance of the office.
We love our patients and staff like family and strive to provide the highest quality of care available. We are a subluxation-based chiropractic practice with a focus on family-based corrective wellness care. We are looking for Chiropractors who will embrace the 100% vision to build an incredible practice to best serve the patients in our community.

We pay better. We teach more and our associates go on to great careers.
This is what we are offering.
Our associates earn more than most associates, and they have fun every day. We teach you how we run our successful practice. We done it for more than 30 years.
You will not be just an exam doc, but a true practicing chiropractor seeing real patients right away.
Our practice generates new patients in car accidents, decompression, cold laser and spinal rehab programs.
We teach you how to teach chiropractic for great new patients and retention.

Well Set is a sports, pediatric, and prenatal certified practice located in the popular Highlands neighborhood in Denver, CO. We provide movement focused treatments for active families. Our providers include chiropractors, physical therapists, massage therapists, and acupuncturists. We are committed to providing the most high-quality experiences for our patients and community members by continuously striving to advance our techniques and to expand our service options for our patients. Our main goals are to: get patients out of pain as soon as possible; use the fewest number of treatments; and help our community in a fun and positive environment. We are a cash practice that lives by a “few and through” rule. If we don’t have our patients on the right track within a few visits, we get them to the right provider whether that means getting care in or out of our office. Chiropractors have a flexible schedule and autonomy to work within their expertise while also receiving support to continue to grow and gain skills through collaboration with other team members.

About us
People's Best Care Chiropractic
Since we opened our doors in 2006, we've been building our reputation as the place to go for all things health and wellness in Brockton & Mattapan in Massachusetts. We offer a variety of services ranging from Chiropractic Care and Rehabilitation Services to Health Food Products and Weight Loss Advice. Every service we provide comes with personalized, compassionate care that's designed with you and your needs in mind. Whether you're seeking help with chronic pain from a personal injury accident, work incident, general bodily injury, in search of new supplements to enhance your diet, or want to be set on the path to healthy weight loss, we'd love to be the team to help you get there!
We are seeking a Part-Time Chiropractor, for a personal injury-based practice located in our Mattapan MA office! Our Chiropractors provide safe noninvasive and effective treatment that generally serves personal injury accidents, workers comp injuries and wellness rehabilitation therapy. Our Chiropractic ensures service is provided by skilled professionals, who commit to improving the health and wellness of individuals. Our main goal is to provide excellent service by forms of various techniques, which include manual therapy, manipulative therapy, physical exercises, kinesio taping and more. Furthermore, we find passion by educating our clientele on the importance of optimal health and personal care. We are looking for a positive individual with excellent communication skills, and a passion for helping others through Chiropractic Care. We are an excellent team of working individuals, who provide nothing but the best service to our clientele. We offer a great salary, one that is up for negotiation depending on experience. Whilst providing performance incentives, we offer paid time off and holiday pay. If full-time, our office hours are Monday through Friday from 9 AM - 6 PM. If part-time, our office hours are Monday, Wednesday and Friday from 9 AM - 6 PM. Please be advised that our office hours may vary for a full-time candidate. We are looking for a Doctor of Chiropractic, with a Massachusetts State License in good standing, who can start immediately! Please email your resume and cover letter.

Use heat, cold, massage therapy and other methods to treat patients.
Obtain and record patients’ medical histories.
Arrange for diagnostic x-rays to be taken.

Conduct patient consultations by reviewing health and medical histories; questioning, observing and examining patients; and reviewing x-rays, as indicated.

Use heat, cold, massage therapy and other methods to treat patients.
Obtain and record patients’ medical histories.
Arrange for diagnostic x-rays to be taken.

About us
People's Best Care Chiropractic

We are looking for a Doctor of Chiropractic, with a Massachusetts State License in good standing, who can start immediately! Please email your resume and cover letter.

About us
People's Best Care Chiropractic
Since we opened our doors in 2006, we've been building our reputation as the place to go for all things health and wellness in Brockton & Mattapan in Massachusetts. We offer a variety of services ranging from Chiropractic Care and Rehabilitation Services to Health Food Products and Weight Loss Advice. Every service we provide comes with personalized, compassionate care that's designed with you and your needs in mind. Whether you're seeking help with chronic pain from a personal injury accident, work incident, general bodily injury, in search of new supplements to enhance your diet, or want to be set on the path to healthy weight loss, we'd love to be the team to help you get there!
We are seeking a Part-Time Chiropractor, for a personal injury-based practice located in our Mattapan MA office! Our Chiropractors provide safe noninvasive and effective treatment that generally serves personal injury accidents, workers comp injuries and wellness rehabilitation therapy. Our Chiropractic ensures service is provided by skilled professionals, who commit to improving the health and wellness of individuals. Our main goal is to provide excellent service by forms of various techniques, which include manual therapy, manipulative therapy, physical exercises, kinesio taping and more. Furthermore, we find passion by educating our clientele on the importance of optimal health and personal care. We are looking for a positive individual with excellent communication skills, and a passion for helping others through Chiropractic Care. We are an excellent team of working individuals, who provide nothing but the best service to our clientele. We offer a great salary, one that is up for negotiation depending on experience. Whilst providing performance incentives, we offer paid time off and holiday pay. If full-time, our office hours are Monday through Friday from 9 AM - 6 PM. If part-time, our office hours are Monday, Wednesday and Friday from 9 AM - 6 PM. Please be advised that our office hours may vary for a full-time candidate. We are looking for a Doctor of Chiropractic, with a Massachusetts State License in good standing, who can start immediately! Please email your resume and cover letter.

We specialize in auto injury care, sports injury care, work injury care, family care (pregnancy and pediatric), slip-and-falls, sore muscles, lower back pain, and neck pain. About Advanced Wellness

Office Culture
Our core values are team work, work ethic, kindness, compassion and legendary service. We believe that a strong work culture makes for happy employees and happy patients. A healthy work environment is important to us.

We pay better. We teach more and our associates go on to great careers.
This is what we are offering.
Our associates earn more than most associates, and they have fun every day. We teach you how we run our successful practice. We done it for more than 30 years.

The beauty of the New Hampshire is calling your name. We are expanding and would love to have you apply for a Chiropractic Associate opportunity!
We are a riveting, energetic, thriving practice looking for the right candidate that will be actively working with patients. You will find yourself immediately immersed in expected daily tasks, and not just a glorified new patient marketer. We are an evidenced based practice, using diversified, and various soft tissue methods. You will be also be expected to work with an in house exercise therapist/personal trainer to delegate the ideal corrective exercise routines for patients.
We are located in Lebanon, New Hampshire. An ideal place to live thanks to our beautiful 4-season climate, lakes, oceans and mountains-all calling your name, (premier skiing destinations' are only 45 minutes away!), with the bonus of Dartmouth Hitchcock Hospital, one of the top hospitals in the nation, and top employer in the area, right in our back yard.

Well Set is a sports, pediatric, and prenatal certified practice located in the popular Highlands neighborhood in Denver, CO. We provide movement focused treatments for active families. Our providers include chiropractors, physical therapists, massage therapists, and acupuncturists. We are committed to providing the most high-quality experiences for our patients and community members by continuously striving to advance our techniques and to expand our service options for our patients. Our main goals are to: get patients out of pain as soon as possible; use the fewest number of treatments; and help our community in a fun and positive environment. We are a cash practice that lives by a “few and through” rule. If we don’t have our patients on the right track within a few visits, we get them to the right provider whether that means getting care in or out of our office. Chiropractors have a flexible schedule and autonomy to work within their expertise while also receiving support to continue to grow and gain skills through collaboration with other team members.

Voted best chiropractic office in Austin this past year! Lifespring Chiropractic just turned 4 years old. We are growing and are looking for the right fit to add to the team. We are looking for somebody who is passionate about CHIROPRACTIC! Job Title: Clinic Director/Chiropractor -$2000 signing and separate relocation stipend
Job Description:
We are looking for Regional Directors/Clinic Directors and Associate Chiropractors for our Beaumont clinics.
As a chiropractor you will enjoy the support of an experienced ownership team which operates multiple locations, as well as a comprehensive compensation plan which starts at 65K+ first year and includes bonuses and profit revenue sharing. This position will scale up to over 70K - 100K typically within the first year.
Our Chiropractic model lets you be the doctor you've always wanted to be, where the patient comes first. No insurance paperwork, no insurance collections, no marketing decisions, no bureaucracy, no networking meetings, or worrying about overhead. 90% of your stress is gone and you are singularly focused on treating patients, healing people, building relationships and growing the member base.
Join us on our mission by practicing pure chiropractic while earning a professional salary and sharing in the growth and success of the clinic.

Dedication to high quality service

Enthusiastic approach to customer service

Able to stand and/or sit for long periods of time
Able to lift up to 25 pounds

$70k-$100k, bonuses.

The beauty of the New Hampshire is calling your name. We are expanding and would love to have you apply for a Chiropractic Associate opportunity!
We are a riveting, energetic, thriving practice looking for the right candidate that will be actively working with patients. You will find yourself immediately immersed in expected daily tasks, and not just a glorified new patient marketer. We are an evidenced based practice, using diversified, and various soft tissue methods. You will be also be expected to work with an in house exercise therapist/personal trainer to delegate the ideal corrective exercise routines for patients.
We are located in Lebanon, New Hampshire. An ideal place to live thanks to our beautiful 4-season climate, lakes, oceans and mountains-all calling your name, (premier skiing destinations' are only 45 minutes away!), with the bonus of Dartmouth Hitchcock Hospital, one of the top hospitals in the nation, and top employer in the area, right in our back yard.

Well Set is a sports, pediatric, and prenatal certified practice located in the popular Highlands neighborhood in Denver, CO. We provide movement focused treatments for active families. Our providers include chiropractors, physical therapists, massage therapists, and acupuncturists. We are committed to providing the most high-quality experiences for our patients and community members by continuously striving to advance our techniques and to expand our service options for our patients. Our main goals are to: get patients out of pain as soon as possible; use the fewest number of treatments; and help our community in a fun and positive environment. We are a cash practice that lives by a “few and through” rule. If we don’t have our patients on the right track within a few visits, we get them to the right provider whether that means getting care in or out of our office. Chiropractors have a flexible schedule and autonomy to work within their expertise while also receiving support to continue to grow and gain skills through collaboration with other team members.

We are looking for chiropractors that are dynamic, motivated and know how to build and lead their amazing teams. Connected Health Centers are actively looking for Chiropractors who want to radically change the health of their community while building amazing practices.
Connected Health partners with motivated chiropractors that seek to build and own their own practice, while benefiting from being a part of a team of like-minded individuals with the same long-term goals.
You will join the Connected Health team as a 50/50 partner. You will earn a growing percentage of the profits in your practice, and enjoy all the support provided by our comprehensive business structure: a well-appointed office in a competitive location, recruiting assistance, training, reimbursement, marketing services catered to your situation, routine training to share best practices, facilities management, periodic team meetings, etc.

Well Set is a sports, pediatric, and prenatal certified practice located in the popular Highlands neighborhood in Denver, CO. We provide movement focused treatments for active families. Our providers include chiropractors, physical therapists, massage therapists, and acupuncturists. We are committed to providing the most high-quality experiences for our patients and community members by continuously striving to advance our techniques and to expand our service options for our patients. Our main goals are to: get patients out of pain as soon as possible; use the fewest number of treatments; and help our community in a fun and positive environment. We are a cash practice that lives by a “few and through” rule. If we don’t have our patients on the right track within a few visits, we get them to the right provider whether that means getting care in or out of our office. Chiropractors have a flexible schedule and autonomy to work within their expertise while also receiving support to continue to grow and gain skills through collaboration with other team members.

Full or part time with flexible hours

Job Title: Chiropractor -$2000 signing and separate relocation stipend
Job Description:
We are looking for several Clinic Directors and Associate Chiropractors for our Houston clinics.
As a chiropractor you will enjoy the support of an experienced ownership team which operates multiple locations, as well as a comprehensive compensation plan which starts at 60K+ first year and includes bonuses and profit revenue sharing. This position will scale up to over 70K - 100K typically within the first year.
Our Chiropractic model lets you be the doctor you've always wanted to be, where the patient comes first. No insurance paperwork, no insurance collections, no marketing decisions, no bureaucracy, no networking meetings, or worrying about overhead. 90% of your stress is gone and you are singularly focused on treating patients, healing people, building relationships and growing the member base.
Join us on our mission by practicing pure chiropractic while earning a professional salary and sharing in the growth and success of the clinic.

Provide consultations, exams, and treatment plans for chiropractic maintenance visits.
Primarily utilizing diversified adjustments and drop tables/activator.
Ability to educate patients on benefits of regular chiropractic maintenance.

Doctor of Chiropractor License for Texas (preferred) in good standing
Cheerful, outgoing demeanor
Able to work weekends (if needed)
Dedication to high quality service
Maintain a professional appearance and appropriate attire
Enthusiastic approach to customer service

Able to stand and/or sit for long periods of time
Able to lift up to 25 pounds

$70k-$100k, bonuses.

Unique opportunity for a Chiropractor to join a growing healthcare company. Work on patients with acute musculoskeletal and orthopedic injuries. PRN to start, but high potential to grow into a full-time position. Very flexible schedule, the ability to work independently with you patients at you convenience, and a competitive starting rate.
- New grads welcome
- Strong manual skills
- Good bedside manner
- Organized
- Team Player

Duties and Responsibilities
Conduct patient consultations by reviewing health and medical histories; questioning, observing and examining patients; and reviewing x-rays, as indicated.
Evaluate patients’ neuromusculoskeletal systems and the spine using chiropractic diagnosis to determine neuromusculoskeletal and spine related conditions.
Perform manual adjustments to the spine, or other articulations of the body, to correct the musculoskeletal system.
Use heat, cold, massage therapy and other methods to treat patients.
Obtain and record patients’ medical histories.
Arrange for diagnostic x-rays to be taken.

Top chiropractor / chiropractic physician needed in Denver
Growing clinic is looking for friendly, professional Doctor of Chiropractic
Aim High is a full-service chiropractic and wellness clinic. We have 4 offices in Denver, Aurora, DTC and Wheat Ridge. We specialize in auto injury care, sports injury care, work injury care, family care (pregnancy and pediatric), slip-and-falls, sore muscles, lower back pain, and neck pain. We're a proudly diverse crew united by humanism, intellectual curiosity, and a powerful mission: redesigning healthcare and bringing world-class primary care to everyone.
A successful candidate should also have:
Possession of a valid license as a Chiropractor in Colorado
An interest in using technology to deliver high quality, evidence-based primary care (able to use all office equipment / computer system, patient management software)

Who We Are:

About us
People's Best Care Chiropractic
Since we opened our doors in 2006, we've been building our reputation as the place to go for all things health and wellness in Brockton & Mattapan in Massachusetts. We offer a variety of services ranging from Chiropractic Care and Rehabilitation Services to Health Food Products and Weight Loss Advice. Every service we provide comes with personalized, compassionate care that's designed with you and your needs in mind. Whether you're seeking help with chronic pain from a personal injury accident, work incident, general bodily injury, in search of new supplements to enhance your diet, or want to be set on the path to healthy weight loss, we'd love to be the team to help you get there!
We are seeking a Part-Time Chiropractor, for a personal injury-based practice located in our Mattapan MA office! Our Chiropractors provide safe noninvasive and effective treatment that generally serves personal injury accidents, workers comp injuries and wellness rehabilitation therapy. Our Chiropractic ensures service is provided by skilled professionals, who commit to improving the health and wellness of individuals. Our main goal is to provide excellent service by forms of various techniques, which include manual therapy, manipulative therapy, physical exercises, kinesio taping and more. Furthermore, we find passion by educating our clientele on the importance of optimal health and personal care. We are looking for a positive individual with excellent communication skills, and a passion for helping others through Chiropractic Care. We are an excellent team of working individuals, who provide nothing but the best service to our clientele. We offer a great salary, one that is up for negotiation depending on experience. Whilst providing performance incentives, we offer paid time off and holiday pay. If full-time, our office hours are Monday through Friday from 9 AM - 6 PM. If part-time, our office hours are Monday, Wednesday and Friday from 9 AM - 6 PM. Please be advised that our office hours may vary for a full-time candidate. We are looking for a Doctor of Chiropractic, with a Massachusetts State License in good standing, who can start immediately! Please email your resume and cover letter.

About us
People's Best Care Chiropractic
Since we opened our doors in 2006, we've been building our reputation as the place to go for all things health and wellness in Brockton & Mattapan in Massachusetts. We offer a variety of services ranging from Chiropractic Care and Rehabilitation Services to Health Food Products and Weight Loss Advice. Every service we provide comes with personalized, compassionate care that's designed with you and your needs in mind. Whether you're seeking help with chronic pain from a personal injury accident, work incident, general bodily injury, in search of new supplements to enhance your diet, or want to be set on the path to healthy weight loss, we'd love to be the team to help you get there!
We are seeking a Part-Time Chiropractor, for a personal injury-based practice located in our Mattapan MA office! Our Chiropractors provide safe noninvasive and effective treatment that generally serves personal injury accidents, workers comp injuries and wellness rehabilitation therapy. Our Chiropractic ensures service is provided by skilled professionals, who commit to improving the health and wellness of individuals. Our main goal is to provide excellent service by forms of various techniques, which include manual therapy, manipulative therapy, physical exercises, kinesio taping and more. Furthermore, we find passion by educating our clientele on the importance of optimal health and personal care. We are looking for a positive individual with excellent communication skills, and a passion for helping others through Chiropractic Care. We are an excellent team of working individuals, who provide nothing but the best service to our clientele. We offer a great salary, one that is up for negotiation depending on experience. Whilst providing performance incentives, we offer paid time off and holiday pay. If full-time, our office hours are Monday through Friday from 9 AM - 6 PM. If part-time, our office hours are Monday, Wednesday and Friday from 9 AM - 6 PM. Please be advised that our office hours may vary for a full-time candidate. We are looking for a Doctor of Chiropractic, with a Massachusetts State License in good standing, who can start immediately! Please email your resume and cover letter.

Merrill Clinics, an operator of The Joint is Hiring Chiropractors: Full Time Pay for Part Time Hours – Four Day Work Week
We are seeking skilled Chiropractors who are committed to excellence and delivering the highest level of chiropractic care, working Friday through Monday for 32-40 hours/week. Who We Are:
Northern Lights Chiropractic is a family run and owned 40 year business. Dr. Larry Silverstein and Dr. Becky Keshmiri are leaders in their community and leaders in the Tony Robbins environment for the past 6 years. We have help thousands of people globally and love supporting people’s growth. If you desire to strengthen your skill sets, become a better doctor and grow as a person, this is the place for you. If you already have worked on your personal standards and have developed your skill sets you will love working within our well established and organized office. Our mission is to restore nerve function, increase range of motion, and slow and stop degeneration for people to have a more comfortable and health life. To fulfill this mission, we are looking for an addition to our amazing and skillful team. The access to our unique care and hand-on approaches is like no other.

We are seeking an energetic and passionate Chiropractor to join our team. We pride ourselves on our level of commitment to patient care and quality service. We have been in practice for 6 years and Align Chiropractic Clinic has grown into the Jefferson City and surrounding central MO area; with 2 locations currently and more to come within minutes of the city to make for an easy commute.
With our proven systems and workplace culture you can be sure that we will take care of you while you take care of your patients. From the start we will compensate you with a competitive salary- no need to struggle thru percentage based compensation as you build your patient base. We understand it takes time and want to compensate you from the start. As you come into your element we will begin distributing performance based bonus/raises. Compensation package also includes Paid licensing fees, retirement fund, paid malpractice insurance, paid vacations, paid state association fees, and paid continuing education.

Join MCR Chiropractic in the Boston Area and be a part of a team of chiropractors that have provided exceptional patient care and have had an unmatched provider experience for over 30 years. MCR Chiropractic is truly committed to the growth of our chiropractors and the profession as a whole.
Our clinics are multidisciplinary and work alongside physical therapists providing the most comprehensive care for our patients, and create a unique collaborative care model for our chiropractic providers.

About Advanced Wellness
We are in integrated practice with a team of MD's, Ortho surgeons, Chiropractors, Physical Therapists, Acupuncturists and Nutritionists. We pride ourselves in the collaboration of our clinical expertise.
Office Culture
Our core values are team work, work ethic, kindness, compassion and legendary service. We believe that a strong work culture makes for happy employees and happy patients. A healthy work environment is important to us.

Well Set is a sports, pediatric, and prenatal certified practice located in the popular Highlands neighborhood in Denver, CO. We provide movement focused treatments for active families. Our providers include chiropractors, physical therapists, massage therapists, and acupuncturists. We are committed to providing the most high-quality experiences for our patients and community members by continuously striving to advance our techniques and to expand our service options for our patients. Our main goals are to: get patients out of pain as soon as possible; use the fewest number of treatments; and help our community in a fun and positive environment. We are a cash practice that lives by a “few and through” rule. If we don’t have our patients on the right track within a few visits, we get them to the right provider whether that means getting care in or out of our office. Chiropractors have a flexible schedule and autonomy to work within their expertise while also receiving support to continue to grow and gain skills through collaboration with other team members.

The beauty of the New Hampshire is calling your name. We are expanding and would love to have you apply for a Chiropractic Associate opportunity!
We are a riveting, energetic, thriving practice looking for the right candidate that will be actively working with patients. You will find yourself immediately immersed in expected daily tasks, and not just a glorified new patient marketer. We are an evidenced based practice, using diversified, and various soft tissue methods. You will be also be expected to work with an in house exercise therapist/personal trainer to delegate the ideal corrective exercise routines for patients.
We are located in Lebanon, New Hampshire. An ideal place to live thanks to our beautiful 4-season climate, lakes, oceans and mountains-all calling your name, (premier skiing destinations' are only 45 minutes away!), with the bonus of Dartmouth Hitchcock Hospital, one of the top hospitals in the nation, and top employer in the area, right in our back yard.

Duties and Responsibilities
Conduct patient consultations by reviewing health and medical histories; questioning, observing and examining patients; and reviewing x-rays, as indicated.
Evaluate patients’ neuromusculoskeletal systems and the spine using chiropractic diagnosis to determine neuromusculoskeletal and spine related conditions.
Perform manual adjustments to the spine, or other articulations of the body, to correct the musculoskeletal system.
Use heat, cold, massage therapy and other methods to treat patients.
Obtain and record patients’ medical histories.
Arrange for diagnostic x-rays to be taken.

Our Chiropractic model lets you be the doctor you've always wanted to be, where the patient comes first. Able to lift up to 25 pounds

$70k-$100k, bonuses.

Well Set is a sports, pediatric, and prenatal certified practice located in the popular Highlands neighborhood in Denver, CO. We provide movement focused treatments for active families. Our providers include chiropractors, physical therapists, massage therapists, and acupuncturists. We are committed to providing the most high-quality experiences for our patients and community members by continuously striving to advance our techniques and to expand our service options for our patients. Our main goals are to: get patients out of pain as soon as possible; use the fewest number of treatments; and help our community in a fun and positive environment. We are a cash practice that lives by a “few and through” rule. If we don’t have our patients on the right track within a few visits, we get them to the right provider whether that means getting care in or out of our office. Chiropractors have a flexible schedule and autonomy to work within their expertise while also receiving support to continue to grow and gain skills through collaboration with other team members.

Aim High is a full-service chiropractic and wellness clinic. We have 4 offices in Denver, Aurora, DTC and Wheat Ridge. We specialize in auto injury care, sports injury care, work injury care, family care (pregnancy and pediatric), slip-and-falls, sore muscles, lower back pain, and neck pain. Duties and Responsibilities
Conduct patient consultations by reviewing health and medical histories; questioning, observing and examining patients; and reviewing x-rays, as indicated.
Evaluate patients’ neuromusculoskeletal systems and the spine using chiropractic diagnosis to determine neuromusculoskeletal and spine related conditions.
Perform manual adjustments to the spine, or other articulations of the body, to correct the musculoskeletal system.
Use heat, cold, massage therapy and other methods to treat patients.
Obtain and record patients’ medical histories.
Arrange for diagnostic x-rays to be taken.

Job Title: Chiropractor -$2000 signing and separate relocation stipend
Job Description:
We are looking for several Clinic Directors and Associate Chiropractors for our Houston clinics.
As a chiropractor you will enjoy the support of an experienced ownership team which operates multiple locations, as well as a comprehensive compensation plan which starts at 60K+ first year and includes bonuses and profit revenue sharing. This position will scale up to over 70K - 100K typically within the first year.
Our Chiropractic model lets you be the doctor you've always wanted to be, where the patient comes first. No insurance paperwork, no insurance collections, no marketing decisions, no bureaucracy, no networking meetings, or worrying about overhead. 90% of your stress is gone and you are singularly focused on treating patients, healing people, building relationships and growing the member base.
Join us on our mission by practicing pure chiropractic while earning a professional salary and sharing in the growth and success of the clinic.

Provide consultations, exams, and treatment plans for chiropractic maintenance visits.
Primarily utilizing diversified adjustments and drop tables/activator.
Ability to educate patients on benefits of regular chiropractic maintenance.

Doctor of Chiropractor License for Texas (preferred) in good standing
Cheerful, outgoing demeanor
Able to work weekends (if needed)
Dedication to high quality service
Maintain a professional appearance and appropriate attire
Enthusiastic approach to customer service

Able to stand and/or sit for long periods of time
Able to lift up to 25 pounds

$70k-$100k, bonuses.

Established clinic in Dallas has an opening for a treating chiropractor. Step in and take over the patient load from day one. Base salary plus monthly bonus; excellent execution of our procedures and processes typically lead to more. Must be coachable, have a high level of personal accountability, have a willingness to be the most diligent learner on staff as well as the hardest worker. No marketing expectations of the doctor. This is a full-time pay, lead DC position with a 32-hour work week. No Saturdays.

About us
People's Best Care Chiropractic
Since we opened our doors in 2006, we've been building our reputation as the place to go for all things health and wellness in Brockton & Mattapan in Massachusetts. We offer a variety of services ranging from Chiropractic Care and Rehabilitation Services to Health Food Products and Weight Loss Advice. Every service we provide comes with personalized, compassionate care that's designed with you and your needs in mind. Whether you're seeking help with chronic pain from a personal injury accident, work incident, general bodily injury, in search of new supplements to enhance your diet, or want to be set on the path to healthy weight loss, we'd love to be the team to help you get there!
We are seeking a Part-Time Chiropractor, for a personal injury-based practice located in our Mattapan MA office! Our Chiropractors provide safe noninvasive and effective treatment that generally serves personal injury accidents, workers comp injuries and wellness rehabilitation therapy. Our Chiropractic ensures service is provided by skilled professionals, who commit to improving the health and wellness of individuals. Our main goal is to provide excellent service by forms of various techniques, which include manual therapy, manipulative therapy, physical exercises, kinesio taping and more. Furthermore, we find passion by educating our clientele on the importance of optimal health and personal care. We are looking for a positive individual with excellent communication skills, and a passion for helping others through Chiropractic Care. We are an excellent team of working individuals, who provide nothing but the best service to our clientele. We offer a great salary, one that is up for negotiation depending on experience. Whilst providing performance incentives, we offer paid time off and holiday pay. If full-time, our office hours are Monday through Friday from 9 AM - 6 PM. If part-time, our office hours are Monday, Wednesday and Friday from 9 AM - 6 PM. Please be advised that our office hours may vary for a full-time candidate. We are looking for a Doctor of Chiropractic, with a Massachusetts State License in good standing, who can start immediately! Please email your resume and cover letter.

We are seeking an energetic and passionate Chiropractor to join our team. We pride ourselves on our level of commitment to patient care and quality service. We have been in practice for 6 years and Align Chiropractic Clinic has grown into the Jefferson City and surrounding central MO area; with 2 locations currently and more to come within minutes of the city to make for an easy commute.
With our proven systems and workplace culture you can be sure that we will take care of you while you take care of your patients. From the start we will compensate you with a competitive salary- no need to struggle thru percentage based compensation as you build your patient base. We understand it takes time and want to compensate you from the start. As you come into your element we will begin distributing performance based bonus/raises. Compensation package also includes Paid licensing fees, retirement fund, paid malpractice insurance, paid vacations, paid state association fees, and paid continuing education.

This position will scale up to over 70K - 100K typically within the first year.
Our Chiropractic model lets you be the doctor you've always wanted to be, where the patient comes first. No insurance paperwork, no insurance collections, no marketing decisions, no bureaucracy, no networking meetings, or worrying about overhead. 90% of your stress is gone and you are singularly focused on treating patients, healing people, building relationships and growing the member base.
Join us on our mission by practicing pure chiropractic while earning a professional salary and sharing in the growth and success of the clinic.

The beauty of the New Hampshire is calling your name. We are expanding and would love to have you apply for a Chiropractic Associate opportunity!

Step in and take over the patient load from day one. Base salary plus monthly bonus; excellent execution of our procedures and processes typically lead to more. Must be coachable, have a high level of personal accountability, have a willingness to be the most diligent learner on staff as well as the hardest worker. No marketing expectations of the doctor. About us
People's Best Care Chiropractic
Since we opened our doors in 2006, we've been building our reputation as the place to go for all things health and wellness in Brockton & Mattapan in Massachusetts. We offer a variety of services ranging from Chiropractic Care and Rehabilitation Services to Health Food Products and Weight Loss Advice. Every service we provide comes with personalized, compassionate care that's designed with you and your needs in mind. Whether you're seeking help with chronic pain from a personal injury accident, work incident, general bodily injury, in search of new supplements to enhance your diet, or want to be set on the path to healthy weight loss, we'd love to be the team to help you get there!
We are seeking a Part-Time Chiropractor, for a personal injury-based practice located in our Mattapan MA office! Our Chiropractors provide safe noninvasive and effective treatment that generally serves personal injury accidents, workers comp injuries and wellness rehabilitation therapy. Our Chiropractic ensures service is provided by skilled professionals, who commit to improving the health and wellness of individuals. Our main goal is to provide excellent service by forms of various techniques, which include manual therapy, manipulative therapy, physical exercises, kinesio taping and more. Furthermore, we find passion by educating our clientele on the importance of optimal health and personal care. We are looking for a positive individual with excellent communication skills, and a passion for helping others through Chiropractic Care. We are an excellent team of working individuals, who provide nothing but the best service to our clientele. We offer a great salary, one that is up for negotiation depending on experience. Whilst providing performance incentives, we offer paid time off and holiday pay. If full-time, our office hours are Monday through Friday from 9 AM - 6 PM. If part-time, our office hours are Monday, Wednesday and Friday from 9 AM - 6 PM. Please be advised that our office hours may vary for a full-time candidate. We are looking for a Doctor of Chiropractic, with a Massachusetts State License in good standing, who can start immediately! Please email your resume and cover letter.

We are seeking an energetic and passionate Chiropractor to join our team. We pride ourselves on our level of commitment to patient care and quality service. With our proven systems and workplace culture you can be sure that we will take care of you while you take care of your patients. We understand it takes time and want to compensate you from the start. As you come into your element we will begin distributing performance based bonus/raises. Well Set is a sports, pediatric, and prenatal certified practice located in the popular Highlands neighborhood in Denver, CO. We provide movement focused treatments for active families. Our providers include chiropractors, physical therapists, massage therapists, and acupuncturists. We are committed to providing the most high-quality experiences for our patients and community members by continuously striving to advance our techniques and to expand our service options for our patients. Our main goals are to: get patients out of pain as soon as possible; use the fewest number of treatments; and help our community in a fun and positive environment. We are a cash practice that lives by a “few and through” rule. If we don’t have our patients on the right track within a few visits, we get them to the right provider whether that means getting care in or out of our office. Chiropractors have a flexible schedule and autonomy to work within their expertise while also receiving support to continue to grow and gain skills through collaboration with other team members.

Duties and Responsibilities
Conduct patient consultations by reviewing health and medical histories; questioning, observing and examining patients; and reviewing x-rays, as indicated.
Evaluate patients’ neuromusculoskeletal systems and the spine using chiropractic diagnosis to determine neuromusculoskeletal and spine related conditions.
Perform manual adjustments to the spine, or other articulations of the body, to correct the musculoskeletal system.
Use heat, cold, massage therapy and other methods to treat patients.
Obtain and record patients’ medical histories.
Arrange for diagnostic x-rays to be taken.

Well Set is a sports, pediatric, and prenatal certified practice located in the popular Highlands neighborhood in Denver, CO. We provide movement focused treatments for active families. Our providers include chiropractors, physical therapists, massage therapists, and acupuncturists. We are committed to providing the most high-quality experiences for our patients and community members by continuously striving to advance our techniques and to expand our service options for our patients. Our main goals are to: get patients out of pain as soon as possible; use the fewest number of treatments; and help our community in a fun and positive environment. We are a cash practice that lives by a “few and through” rule. If we don’t have our patients on the right track within a few visits, we get them to the right provider whether that means getting care in or out of our office. Chiropractors have a flexible schedule and autonomy to work within their expertise while also receiving support to continue to grow and gain skills through collaboration with other team members.

Duties and Responsibilities
Conduct patient consultations by reviewing health and medical histories; questioning, observing and examining patients; and reviewing x-rays, as indicated.
Evaluate patients’ neuromusculoskeletal systems and the spine using chiropractic diagnosis to determine neuromusculoskeletal and spine related conditions.
Perform manual adjustments to the spine, or other articulations of the body, to correct the musculoskeletal system.
Use heat, cold, massage therapy and other methods to treat patients.
Obtain and record patients’ medical histories.
Arrange for diagnostic x-rays to be taken.

Job Title: Chiropractor -$2000 signing and separate relocation stipend
Job Description:
We are looking for several Clinic Directors and Associate Chiropractors for our Houston clinics.
As a chiropractor you will enjoy the support of an experienced ownership team which operates multiple locations, as well as a comprehensive compensation plan which starts at 60K+ first year and includes bonuses and profit revenue sharing. This position will scale up to over 70K - 100K typically within the first year.
Our Chiropractic model lets you be the doctor you've always wanted to be, where the patient comes first. No insurance paperwork, no insurance collections, no marketing decisions, no bureaucracy, no networking meetings, or worrying about overhead. 90% of your stress is gone and you are singularly focused on treating patients, healing people, building relationships and growing the member base.
Join us on our mission by practicing pure chiropractic while earning a professional salary and sharing in the growth and success of the clinic.

Provide consultations, exams, and treatment plans for chiropractic maintenance visits.
Primarily utilizing diversified adjustments and drop tables/activator.
Ability to educate patients on benefits of regular chiropractic maintenance.

Doctor of Chiropractor License for Texas (preferred) in good standing
Cheerful, outgoing demeanor
Able to work weekends (if needed)
Dedication to high quality service
Maintain a professional appearance and appropriate attire
Enthusiastic approach to customer service

Able to stand and/or sit for long periods of time
Able to lift up to 25 pounds

$70k-$100k, bonuses.

The beauty of the New Hampshire is calling your name. We are expanding and would love to have you apply for a Chiropractic Associate opportunity!

We are an evidenced based practice, using diversified, and various soft tissue methods. We are located in Lebanon, New Hampshire. An ideal place to live thanks to our beautiful 4-season climate, lakes, oceans and mountains-all calling your name, (premier skiing destinations' are only 45 minutes away!), with the bonus of Dartmouth Hitchcock Hospital, one of the top hospitals in the nation, and top employer in the area, right in our back yard.

Established clinic in Dallas has an opening for a treating chiropractor. Our clinic sees a consistent number of patients of a diverse mix, from cash to personal injury to health insurance to medicare and has well trained staff. Step in and take over the patient load from day one. Base salary plus monthly bonus; excellent execution of our procedures and processes typically lead to more. Must be coachable, have a high level of personal accountability, have a willingness to be the most diligent learner on staff as well as the hardest worker. No marketing expectations of the doctor. This is a full-time pay, lead DC position with a 32-hour work week. No Saturdays.

About us
People's Best Care Chiropractic
Since we opened our doors in 2006, we've been building our reputation as the place to go for all things health and wellness in Brockton & Mattapan in Massachusetts. We offer a variety of services ranging from Chiropractic Care and Rehabilitation Services to Health Food Products and Weight Loss Advice. Every service we provide comes with personalized, compassionate care that's designed with you and your needs in mind. Whether you're seeking help with chronic pain from a personal injury accident, work incident, general bodily injury, in search of new supplements to enhance your diet, or want to be set on the path to healthy weight loss, we'd love to be the team to help you get there!
We are seeking a Part-Time Chiropractor, for a personal injury-based practice located in our Mattapan MA office! Our Chiropractors provide safe noninvasive and effective treatment that generally serves personal injury accidents, workers comp injuries and wellness rehabilitation therapy. Our Chiropractic ensures service is provided by skilled professionals, who commit to improving the health and wellness of individuals. Our main goal is to provide excellent service by forms of various techniques, which include manual therapy, manipulative therapy, physical exercises, kinesio taping and more. Furthermore, we find passion by educating our clientele on the importance of optimal health and personal care. We are looking for a positive individual with excellent communication skills, and a passion for helping others through Chiropractic Care. We are an excellent team of working individuals, who provide nothing but the best service to our clientele. We offer a great salary, one that is up for negotiation depending on experience. Whilst providing performance incentives, we offer paid time off and holiday pay. If full-time, our office hours are Monday through Friday from 9 AM - 6 PM. If part-time, our office hours are Monday, Wednesday and Friday from 9 AM - 6 PM. Please be advised that our office hours may vary for a full-time candidate. We are looking for a Doctor of Chiropractic, with a Massachusetts State License in good standing, who can start immediately! Please email your resume and cover letter.

With our proven systems and workplace culture you can be sure that we will take care of you while you take care of your patients. Job Title: Chiropractor -$2000 signing and separate relocation stipend
Job Description:
We are looking for several Clinic Directors and Associate Chiropractors for our Houston clinics.
As a chiropractor you will enjoy the support of an experienced ownership team which operates multiple locations, as well as a comprehensive compensation plan which starts at 60K+ first year and includes bonuses and profit revenue sharing. This position will scale up to over 70K - 100K typically within the first year.
Our Chiropractic model lets you be the doctor you've always wanted to be, where the patient comes first. No insurance paperwork, no insurance collections, no marketing decisions, no bureaucracy, no networking meetings, or worrying about overhead. 90% of your stress is gone and you are singularly focused on treating patients, healing people, building relationships and growing the member base.
Join us on our mission by practicing pure chiropractic while earning a professional salary and sharing in the growth and success of the clinic.

Provide consultations, exams, and treatment plans for chiropractic maintenance visits.
Primarily utilizing diversified adjustments and drop tables/activator.

Doctor of Chiropractor License for Texas (preferred) in good standing
Cheerful, outgoing demeanor

$70k-$100k, bonuses.

The beauty of the New Hampshire is calling your name. We are expanding and would love to have you apply for a Chiropractic Associate opportunity!

We are an evidenced based practice, using diversified, and various soft tissue methods. You will be also be expected to work with an in house exercise therapist/personal trainer to delegate the ideal corrective exercise routines for patients.
We are located in Lebanon, New Hampshire. An ideal place to live thanks to our beautiful 4-season climate, lakes, oceans and mountains-all calling your name, (premier skiing destinations' are only 45 minutes away!), with the bonus of Dartmouth Hitchcock Hospital, one of the top hospitals in the nation, and top employer in the area, right in our back yard.

About us
People's Best Care Chiropractic
Since we opened our doors in 2006, we've been building our reputation as the place to go for all things health and wellness in Brockton & Mattapan in Massachusetts. We offer a variety of services ranging from Chiropractic Care and Rehabilitation Services to Health Food Products and Weight Loss Advice. Every service we provide comes with personalized, compassionate care that's designed with you and your needs in mind. Whether you're seeking help with chronic pain from a personal injury accident, work incident, general bodily injury, in search of new supplements to enhance your diet, or want to be set on the path to healthy weight loss, we'd love to be the team to help you get there!
We are seeking a Part-Time Chiropractor, for a personal injury-based practice located in our Mattapan MA office! Our Chiropractors provide safe noninvasive and effective treatment that generally serves personal injury accidents, workers comp injuries and wellness rehabilitation therapy. Our Chiropractic ensures service is provided by skilled professionals, who commit to improving the health and wellness of individuals. Our main goal is to provide excellent service by forms of various techniques, which include manual therapy, manipulative therapy, physical exercises, kinesio taping and more. Furthermore, we find passion by educating our clientele on the importance of optimal health and personal care. We are looking for a positive individual with excellent communication skills, and a passion for helping others through Chiropractic Care. We are an excellent team of working individuals, who provide nothing but the best service to our clientele. We offer a great salary, one that is up for negotiation depending on experience. Whilst providing performance incentives, we offer paid time off and holiday pay. If full-time, our office hours are Monday through Friday from 9 AM - 6 PM. If part-time, our office hours are Monday, Wednesday and Friday from 9 AM - 6 PM. Please be advised that our office hours may vary for a full-time candidate. We are looking for a Doctor of Chiropractic, with a Massachusetts State License in good standing, who can start immediately! Please email your resume and cover letter.

We are seeking an energetic and passionate Chiropractor to join our team. We pride ourselves on our level of commitment to patient care and quality service. With our proven systems and workplace culture you can be sure that we will take care of you while you take care of your patients. We understand it takes time and want to compensate you from the start. As you come into your element we will begin distributing performance based bonus/raises. Compensation package also includes Paid licensing fees, retirement fund, paid malpractice insurance, paid vacations, paid state association fees, and paid continuing education.

Well Set is a sports, pediatric, and prenatal certified practice located in the popular Highlands neighborhood in Denver, CO. We provide movement focused treatments for active families. Our providers include chiropractors, physical therapists, massage therapists, and acupuncturists. We are committed to providing the most high-quality experiences for our patients and community members by continuously striving to advance our techniques and to expand our service options for our patients. Our main goals are to: get patients out of pain as soon as possible; use the fewest number of treatments; and help our community in a fun and positive environment. We are a cash practice that lives by a “few and through” rule. If we don’t have our patients on the right track within a few visits, we get them to the right provider whether that means getting care in or out of our office. Chiropractors have a flexible schedule and autonomy to work within their expertise while also receiving support to continue to grow and gain skills through collaboration with other team members.

Obtain and record patients’ medical histories.
Arrange for diagnostic x-rays to be taken.

Compensation package also includes Paid licensing fees, retirement fund, paid malpractice insurance, paid vacations, paid state association fees, and paid continuing education.

Well Set is a sports, pediatric, and prenatal certified practice located in the popular Highlands neighborhood in Denver, CO. We provide movement focused treatments for active families. Our providers include chiropractors, physical therapists, massage therapists, and acupuncturists. We are committed to providing the most high-quality experiences for our patients and community members by continuously striving to advance our techniques and to expand our service options for our patients. Our main goals are to: get patients out of pain as soon as possible; use the fewest number of treatments; and help our community in a fun and positive environment. We are a cash practice that lives by a “few and through” rule. If we don’t have our patients on the right track within a few visits, we get them to the right provider whether that means getting care in or out of our office. Chiropractors have a flexible schedule and autonomy to work within their expertise while also receiving support to continue to grow and gain skills through collaboration with other team members.

Duties and Responsibilities
Conduct patient consultations by reviewing health and medical histories; questioning, observing and examining patients; and reviewing x-rays, as indicated.
Evaluate patients’ neuromusculoskeletal systems and the spine using chiropractic diagnosis to determine neuromusculoskeletal and spine related conditions.
Perform manual adjustments to the spine, or other articulations of the body, to correct the musculoskeletal system.
Use heat, cold, massage therapy and other methods to treat patients.
Obtain and record patients’ medical histories.
Arrange for diagnostic x-rays to be taken.

Top chiropractor / chiropractic physician needed in Denver

Job Title: Chiropractor -$2000 signing and separate relocation stipend
Job Description:
We are looking for several Clinic Directors and Associate Chiropractors for our Houston clinics.
As a chiropractor you will enjoy the support of an experienced ownership team which operates multiple locations, as well as a comprehensive compensation plan which starts at 60K+ first year and includes bonuses and profit revenue sharing. This position will scale up to over 70K - 100K typically within the first year.
Our Chiropractic model lets you be the doctor you've always wanted to be, where the patient comes first. No insurance paperwork, no insurance collections, no marketing decisions, no bureaucracy, no networking meetings, or worrying about overhead. 90% of your stress is gone and you are singularly focused on treating patients, healing people, building relationships and growing the member base.
Join us on our mission by practicing pure chiropractic while earning a professional salary and sharing in the growth and success of the clinic.

Provide consultations, exams, and treatment plans for chiropractic maintenance visits.
Primarily utilizing diversified adjustments and drop tables/activator.
Ability to educate patients on benefits of regular chiropractic maintenance.

Doctor of Chiropractor License for Texas (preferred) in good standing
Cheerful, outgoing demeanor
Able to work weekends (if needed)
Dedication to high quality service
Maintain a professional appearance and appropriate attire
Enthusiastic approach to customer service

Able to stand and/or sit for long periods of time
Able to lift up to 25 pounds

$70k-$100k, bonuses.

The beauty of the New Hampshire is calling your name. We are expanding and would love to have you apply for a Chiropractic Associate opportunity!

We are located in Lebanon, New Hampshire. An ideal place to live thanks to our beautiful 4-season climate, lakes, oceans and mountains-all calling your name, (premier skiing destinations' are only 45 minutes away!), with the bonus of Dartmouth Hitchcock Hospital, one of the top hospitals in the nation, and top employer in the area, right in our back yard.

Established clinic in Dallas has an opening for a treating chiropractor. Step in and take over the patient load from day one. Base salary plus monthly bonus; excellent execution of our procedures and processes typically lead to more. Must be coachable, have a high level of personal accountability, have a willingness to be the most diligent learner on staff as well as the hardest worker. No marketing expectations of the doctor. This is a full-time pay, lead DC position with a 32-hour work week. No Saturdays.

About us
People's Best Care Chiropractic
Since we opened our doors in 2006, we've been building our reputation as the place to go for all things health and wellness in Brockton & Mattapan in Massachusetts. We offer a variety of services ranging from Chiropractic Care and Rehabilitation Services to Health Food Products and Weight Loss Advice. Every service we provide comes with personalized, compassionate care that's designed with you and your needs in mind. Whether you're seeking help with chronic pain from a personal injury accident, work incident, general bodily injury, in search of new supplements to enhance your diet, or want to be set on the path to healthy weight loss, we'd love to be the team to help you get there!
We are seeking a Part-Time Chiropractor, for a personal injury-based practice located in our Mattapan MA office! Our Chiropractors provide safe noninvasive and effective treatment that generally serves personal injury accidents, workers comp injuries and wellness rehabilitation therapy. Our Chiropractic ensures service is provided by skilled professionals, who commit to improving the health and wellness of individuals. Our main goal is to provide excellent service by forms of various techniques, which include manual therapy, manipulative therapy, physical exercises, kinesio taping and more. Furthermore, we find passion by educating our clientele on the importance of optimal health and personal care. We are looking for a positive individual with excellent communication skills, and a passion for helping others through Chiropractic Care. We are an excellent team of working individuals, who provide nothing but the best service to our clientele. We offer a great salary, one that is up for negotiation depending on experience. Whilst providing performance incentives, we offer paid time off and holiday pay. If full-time, our office hours are Monday through Friday from 9 AM - 6 PM. If part-time, our office hours are Monday, Wednesday and Friday from 9 AM - 6 PM. Please be advised that our office hours may vary for a full-time candidate. We are looking for a Doctor of Chiropractic, with a Massachusetts State License in good standing, who can start immediately! Please email your resume and cover letter.

Conduct patient consultations by reviewing health and medical histories; questioning, observing and examining patients; and reviewing x-rays, as indicated.
Evaluate patients’ neuromusculoskeletal systems and the spine using chiropractic diagnosis to determine neuromusculoskeletal and spine related conditions.
Perform manual adjustments to the spine, or other articulations of the body, to correct the musculoskeletal system.
Use heat, cold, massage therapy and other methods to treat patients.
Obtain and record patients’ medical histories.
Arrange for diagnostic x-rays to be taken.

About us
People's Best Care Chiropractic
Since we opened our doors in 2006, we've been building our reputation as the place to go for all things health and wellness in Brockton & Mattapan in Massachusetts. We offer a variety of services ranging from Chiropractic Care and Rehabilitation Services to Health Food Products and Weight Loss Advice. Every service we provide comes with personalized, compassionate care that's designed with you and your needs in mind. Whether you're seeking help with chronic pain from a personal injury accident, work incident, general bodily injury, in search of new supplements to enhance your diet, or want to be set on the path to healthy weight loss, we'd love to be the team to help you get there!
We are seeking a Part-Time Chiropractor, for a personal injury-based practice located in our Mattapan MA office! Our Chiropractors provide safe noninvasive and effective treatment that generally serves personal injury accidents, workers comp injuries and wellness rehabilitation therapy. Our Chiropractic ensures service is provided by skilled professionals, who commit to improving the health and wellness of individuals. Our main goal is to provide excellent service by forms of various techniques, which include manual therapy, manipulative therapy, physical exercises, kinesio taping and more. Furthermore, we find passion by educating our clientele on the importance of optimal health and personal care. We are looking for a positive individual with excellent communication skills, and a passion for helping others through Chiropractic Care. We are an excellent team of working individuals, who provide nothing but the best service to our clientele. We offer a great salary, one that is up for negotiation depending on experience. Whilst providing performance incentives, we offer paid time off and holiday pay. If full-time, our office hours are Monday through Friday from 9 AM - 6 PM. If part-time, our office hours are Monday, Wednesday and Friday from 9 AM - 6 PM. Please be advised that our office hours may vary for a full-time candidate. We are looking for a Doctor of Chiropractic, with a Massachusetts State License in good standing, who can start immediately! Please email your resume and cover letter.

Well Set is a sports, pediatric, and prenatal certified practice located in the popular Highlands neighborhood in Denver, CO. We provide movement focused treatments for active families. Well Set is a sports, pediatric, and prenatal certified practice located in the popular Highlands neighborhood in Denver, CO. We provide movement focused treatments for active families. Our providers include chiropractors, physical therapists, massage therapists, and acupuncturists. We are committed to providing the most high-quality experiences for our patients and community members by continuously striving to advance our techniques and to expand our service options for our patients. Our main goals are to: get patients out of pain as soon as possible; use the fewest number of treatments; and help our community in a fun and positive environment. We are a cash practice that lives by a “few and through” rule. If we don’t have our patients on the right track within a few visits, we get them to the right provider whether that means getting care in or out of our office. Chiropractors have a flexible schedule and autonomy to work within their expertise while also receiving support to continue to grow and gain skills through collaboration with other team members.
